verses.name: 1 Samuel 7:10
verses.text: And as Samuel was offering up the burnt offering, the Philistines drew near to battle against Israel: but the Lord thundered with a great thunder on that day upon the Philistines, and discomfited them; and they were smitten before Israel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 7:11
verses.text: And the men of Israel went out of Mizpeh, and pursued the Philistines, and smote them, until they came under Beth–car.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 7:12
verses.text: Then Samuel took a stone, and set it between Mizpeh and Shen, and called the name of it Eben–ezer, saying, Hitherto hath the Lord helped us.
